title: Intensive Short-Term Swahili Language Online Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and general understanding of African culture
context.additional_context: Course focused on strengthening practical language skills for workplace application by in-service professionals. Requires content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Understand and produce over 50 daily conversational expressions utilizing basic Swahili grammar structures
Perform fundamental workplace communication tasks (e.g., greetings, task requests, simple negotiations) in Swahili
Analyze audiovisual materials reflecting Swahili-speaking cultural contexts and explain cultural differences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
